title: Is Wearing Overalls Permissible? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem - JAL
transcript: dean from the uk um i wanted to ask about the ruling on the overalls do you know overall no the overalls are the the of like this vest and they call it the wizard in arabic they call it wizard and and they're blue in color and they have like these little hook apron straps that you inside your arms into so my question is are we allowed to wear overalls and the ruling on women praying or wearing over overalls okay overhauls is a uniform like where people wear and it's a shirt and um trousers connected together with a zipper usually or a number of um buttons yeah there's no problem for a man to wear those inshallah
